name: abuse: This video shows bad, cruel or violent behavior against children, old people, animals, and women.
arrest: This video shows police arresting individuals.
arson: This video shows people deliberately setting fire to property.
assault: This video shows a sudden or violent physical attack on someone.
road accidents: This video shows traffic accidents involving vehicles, pedestrians or cyclists.
burglary: This video shows people (thieves) entering into a building or house with the intention to commit theft.
explosion: This video shows destructive event of something blowing apart.
fighting: This video displays two or more people attacking one another.
robbery: This video shows thieves taking money unlawfully by force or threat of force.
shooting incident
fire, aim, reload.
deadly, lethal, accurate, random, stray.
stealing: This video shows people taking property or money without permission.
shoplifting: This video shows people stealing goods from a shop while posing as a shopper.
vandalism: This video shows action involving deliberate destruction of or damage to public or private property.
routine
habit
custom
practice
everyday activity
work, exercise, commute, leisure.
efficient, mundane.
